title: Patent Patrol: SRAMâ€™s tubeless tire Inflation valve revelation
content:
The folks at SRAM know how much of a pain it can be to inflate a tubeless tire. Seating a tubeless tire properly can mean the difference between awesome ride quality and a quick pit stop on the site of the road. So SRAM’s patent shows a redesign to the inflation valve to make it […]

The post Patent Patrol: SRAM’s tubeless tire Inflation valve revelation appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Dan Cavallari
